courses.title: Introduction to Vue 3
courses.description: Learn the fundamentals of Vue.js 3, including components, reactivity, and the composition API.

courses.title: Advanced Vue Techniques
courses.description: Dive deep into advanced Vue concepts like custom directives, plugins, and performance optimization.

courses.title: Vue with TypeScript
courses.description: Master building robust Vue applications using TypeScript for better type safety and maintainability.

courses.title: State Management with Vuex
courses.description: Understand and implement global state management in Vue.js applications using Vuex.

courses.title: Building RESTful APIs with Node.js
courses.description: Learn to create powerful backend APIs using Node.js and Express to power your Vue applications.
